Usecase 01: Aspen Mesh Observability, Visibility and Analytics¶

Objective:¶

Note

Demonstrate Aspen Mesh Service Mesh Observability, Visiblity and Analytics

Guide:¶

  1. Logon either to Aspen Mesh Cluster 1 or Aspen Mesh Cluster 2 Dashboard
  2. Walkthrough some of the deployed apps.
  3. Demonstrate Aspen Mesh analytic metrics

Example
